snippet.title: TerraCraft - What if I turned Terraria into Minecraft??
snippet.description:
TerraCraft is a massive 2D sandbox FANGAME combines Minecraft and Terraria, developed using C++ language and a self-made game engine. I developed this fangame to practice algorithms, software engineering practices and C++ game engine practices. TerraCraft started development after Terraria: Otherworld was officially announced to be terminated, and the first pre-alpha version was completed after 2 years. The content of TerraCraft is based on Minecraft and its well-known mod packages. For the official content of Minecraft, please refer to Mojang Studios and relevant Mod authors’ descriptions. If you like this fangame then show your support to the best Minecraft and Terraria, and also try the awesome Starbound!
TerraCraft is the world’s first 2D sandbox platform game which allow you to play on an INFINITE world in one map. TerraCraft’s unique portal system can save all your locations for teleportation, allowing you to explore more secrets of the unlimited world!
TerraCraft Homepage (Download): https://skyblueyoshi.itch.io/terracraft
Discord: https://discord.gg/mqSsjg8
TerraCraft Main Topic: https://forums.terraria.org/index.php?threads/terracraft-a-fangame-of-terraria-and-minecraft.97301/
BGM:
(1) Aria Math (Minecraft, C418)
(2) Beta (Minecraft, C418)
(3) Biome Party (Minecraft, C418)
(4) 心之所在，决意之针 (NJune)
